claimStakerReward(address,address,uint25.details: not revert if already claimed or reward percentage is 0      allow writing a wrapper to claim for multiple epochs

params.epoch: for which epoch the staker is claiming the reward

claimStakerReward(address,address,uint25.notice: WARNING When staker address is a contract,          it should be able to receive claimed reward in ETH whenever anyone calls this function.
